description:
Gear up for winter adventures and get ready to conquer the trails. With a sneaker like fit and ankle hugging support, the Bravada 2 Thermo Demi is your key to winter warmth and unwavering confidence. A sticky Quantum Grip™ rubber outsole keeps you upright on slippery terrain.

  • Nubuck leather and nylon uppers for long lasting durability and support
  • Waterproof membrane seals out water and lets moisture escape
  • 100 grams synthetic lightweight, low bulk insulation for warmth and comfort
  • NXT lined footbed cover for odour prevention
  • Bungee lace with toggle closure for a secure fit
  • 100% recycled webbing, footbed cover, and lining
  • Bellows tongue keeps out snow and trail debris
  • EVA midsole provides stability and cushioning
  • Super Rebound Compound maximizes shock absorption and comfort
  • Moulded nylon arch shank with rock plate for added protection
  • Sticky Quantum Grip™ rubber outsole has 5mm lugs for durable traction
name: Merrell Bravada 2 Thermo Demi Waterproof Boots - Women's
